author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Yeah I fixed that already on a different branch, need to pull it into the kintsugi one

author: mariusvanderwijden
content:
I've updated the branch with the fix, it should now print a warning instead of an error. 
Would be great if you could send me another log if this warning  Header not found in skeleton is hit.

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: I think a remote node can trigger it by providing a block with invalid parent, it's a bug in the binary search used to determine the common ancestor of two nodes

author: tersec
content: Updated to that branch. Will watch for said Header not found warning and send you logs if I see it.
